settings.description_text: A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my whole heart.
A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my whole heart.
A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my whole heart.
A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my whole heart.
A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my whole heart.
A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my whole heart.
A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my whole heart.
A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my whole heart.

settings.editor:
One morning, when Gregor Samsa woke from troubled dreams, he found himself transformed in his bed into a horrible vermin. He lay on his armour-like back, and if he lifted his head

The bedding was hardly able to cover it and seemed ready to slide off any moment. His many legs, pitifully thin compared with the size of the rest of him, waved about helplessly as he looked.
I am so happy, my dear friend, so absorbed in the exquisite sense of mere tranquil existence, that I neglect my talents. I should be incapable of drawing a single stroke at the present moment.
One morning, when Gregor Samsa woke from troubled dreams.
